article_title: Student Loan Guarantee Foundation of Arkansas Finding New Mission
article_text: A new identity, GuidEd Solutions, is in place for the Student Loan Guarantee Foundation of Arkansas. It's the first in a long list of new products that the SLGFA has the expertise to deliver if it can round up colleges and universities that are willing and able to pay.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news

article_summary:
A new identity, GuidEd Solutions, is in place for the Student Loan Guarantee Foundation of Arkansas.
It's the first in a long list of new products that the SLGFA has the expertise to deliver if it can round up colleges and universities that are willing and able to pay.
